name: Cisaw Seercus
description:
WARNING: If you have trouble saving your score or restarting a game, try playing on Firefox instead of Chrome!

You play two elves in a monster circus.

Try to get the show going for as long as possible, by always landing on your seesaw platform.

Controls are : Q/A/left to move left, D/right to move right, Z/space/up to jump (hold it to go higher), and S/down to fall a bit faster.

You can (and you better) double- and triple-jump while in air.

In order to score points, you must catch the juggler's balls that will appear in the scene. You may see some throwing daggers too, those are NOT to catch, you'll hurt yourself.

This is a hard and challenging game! In order to give you the most control, the movements are VERY sensitive. Be gentle on your keyboard, and you'll get used to them quikly =)

Persevere, the show must go on!
